page.title: 20A Teenager's Saturday.
page.content: On Saturdays I get up later about 8.30am.I have a shower and wash my hair and breakfast (muesli,toast and tea.)I dress in my tennis whites and go with my friend and her father to Keynsham for tennis lessons.We knock up then go into a tournament.After I'm always thirsty so we get a can of coke in the park.My little sister and I have pet hamsters so we clean out the cages,give them fresh bedding and food and play with them whilst we wait for our elder brother to come home from school and my Dad to finish at the surgery.In the afternoon,I go shopping in Bristol to spend my Â£2 pocket money.The bus fare costs 55p. and I can buy one of "Frankie Goes To Hollywood"'s singles for Â£1.45.Bristol is full of street sellers and gangs dressed in Punk and Mod gear showing off. By Sarah Hoare (13 years old)
